text.__SUMMARY__: Shorea multiflora (called, along with some other species in the genus Shorea, Yellow Meranti) is a species of plant in the Dipterocarpaceae family. It is a tree found in Sumatra, Peninsular Malaysia and Borneo.
text.References: Ashton, P. (1998). "Shorea multiflora". The IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. IUCN. 1998: e.T33128A9760046. doi:10.2305/IUCN.UK.1998.RLTS.T33128A9760046.en. Retrieved 22 December 2017.
